query.sql: select t.item_line_id, t.account_id, t.dr_amount, t.cr_amount, t.regist_user_id, t.description, (select user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id = t.regist_user_id) regiest_user, t.regist_time, a.account_name from exp_item_line t,exp_account a where t.account_id = a.account_id and t.book_id = ${@book_id} and t.item_id = ${@item_id}

sqls.executeSql: insert into exp_item_line( item_id, dr_amount, cr_amount, account_id, description, regist_time, regist_user_id, book_id) values( ${@item_id}, ${@dr_amount}, ${@cr_amount}, ${@account_id}, ${@description}, now(), ${@regist_user_id}, ${@book_id})
